block.p: Recent Sales $24 million 447-449 Fulton Street (at Jay Street) and 497-501 Fulton Street (at Bridge Street) Downtown Brooklyn The Laboz family bought these two corner retailing buildings for $12 million each in the Fulton Street Mall. Buyers: Albert, Jason and Jody Laboz (doing business as United American Land L.L.C.) Seller: Emmes Asset Management Broker: Eastern Consolidated

Recent Lease $30.60/sq. ft. $328,185 approximate annual rent 500 Mamaroneck Avenue Harrison, N.Y. A market research firm has signed a 10-year lease for 10,725 square feet on the second floor of the five-story 1987 office building with a fitness center and cafeteria. Tenant: Focus Room Inc. Tenant Broker: NAI Friedland Realty Landlord: W&M Properties

For Sale or Lease $7.95 million or for lease for $8.50/square foot 92 Green Pond Road Rockaway, N.J. This 74,200-square-foot building has refrigeration spaces. Owner: Alan Plotkin Broker: Daniel E. Frankel, Newmark
